Hello dear guests! Thank you for choosing to stay at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel. Thank you very much for your recognition of the room hygiene and the service attitude of the staff. Everything we do is to provide every guest with a home-like experience. The products we deliver and The service quality is reliable, cleanliness and safety come first. We are really touched to see your satisfaction and affirmation. The hotel is located in the Badili Automobile Park on the West 4th Ring Road, and is within walking distance of Haidian 5th Road Ju Station on Metro Line 6. It only takes five minutes, and public transportation is accessible in all directions. We will continue to work hard to prepare you to come back at any time. All the staff of Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel look forward to your every visit and wish you all the best! Manager: Ren Yuanyuan
